name: addSettingTemplate
description:
This API lets you create a Zoom Phone setting template for an account. Template type includes **User**, **Auto Receptionist**, or **Call Queue**. Settings include profile, policy and user settings. After creating a phone template, the settings defined via this request will become the default settings for an account.

**Scope**: * `phone:write:admin` `phone:write` **Prerequisites**: 1. Business or enterprise Zoom account 2. A Zoom Phone license
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

site_id.description: Unique identifier of the site. Required only when multiple sites are enabled. See [Managing multiple sites](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360020809672-Managing-multiple-sites) for details.

type.description: The type of template. Values include `user`, `group`, `autoReceptionist`, `commonarea`, or `interop`.

$ul: **type**: The type of template. Values include: `user`, `group`, `autoReceptionist`, `commonArea`, `zr`, or `interop`.
